Text:
Thanks. I've just finished "Bleak expectations" which you shared some time ago. Brilliant comedy.

Hope this is more of the same. Thanks for sharing!

If you liked "Bleak expectations" then give "The Castle" a try 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5772406/The_Castle_-_S01_to_03_-_Audio_Comedy_-_MP3_-_Slimoo

Let me know if it needs seeding (Says 2 seeders)

Thanks for the tip re: The Castle. 

I'm downloading, every now and then a seeder pops up for a while. It'll be fine, no extra help needed.
